pr_title: [BEAM-10283] Add new overloads of withKeyRanges and withRowFilter met…

timeline.message: [BEAM-10283] Add new overloads of withKeyRanges and withRowFilter methods that take ValueProvider as a parameter.
[BEAM-10283] Add new overloads of withKeyRanges and withRowFilter methods that take ValueProvider as a parameter.

timeline.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText:
nit: currently it seems like overlapping ranges lead to duplicate reads for any keys in the overlapping area, it would be good if either:

overlapping ranges lead to an error
overlapping ranges are correctly fixed up to not produce duplicates
timeline.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: Agreed - personally I would prefer option 2. I think it's out of scope for this PR, though, but I'll be happy to do it as a follow-up. Do you know if there is already a JIRA issue for this?
replies.author: rafi-kamal

replies.bodyText: I'm not aware of a JIRA, you'll need to look. If you don't find one, file one.
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.bodyText: Needs an Apache 2.0 license header in the file. See other files for an example.
timeline.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: Done. Thanks for checking the test results btw, I tried to figure out what's wrong from the failing tests but couldn't find any error logs or stacktraces.
replies.author: rafi-kamal

timeline.message: Move the feature description in CHANGES.md to 2.24.0 and add a license header for BigtableReadOptions.
